item.title: Beard Oil, Zeus Natural Verbena Lime
item.description:
Zeus Beard Oil's fragrant yet masculine Verbena Lime scent keeps your beard smelling clean. The beard oil features an exclusive antioxidant blend of Grape seed oil, Safflower oil, Argan oil, and Vitamin E for moisture and healthy hair growth. It'll add a little shine to dry hair without leaving your beard feeling oily or greasy. The use of beard oil reduces beard itch while moisturizing your skin and hair.


Safflower Seed Oil: Seals moisture in your skin to fight beard itch and dryness.
Argan Oil: Softens beard hairs and adds luster to your hair.
Vitamin E: Stimulates blood circulation for elastic skin and less flaking.
Grape Seed Oil: Soothes the skin thanks to its anti-inflammatory properties and acts as a mild astringent for acne-prone skin.

Paraben Free | Sulfate Free | Cruelty Free

item.title: Beard Conditioner and Softener 8 fl oz, Zeus Verbena Lime
item.description: Zeus Beard Conditioner in Verbena Lime is a superior beard softener, containing natural ingredients that tame even the most bristly beards and/or mustaches. We know beard growth can often be uncomfortable due to the dry, itchy skin beneath the beard. Zeus Beard Conditioner combats flaky skin with a blend of Pro-vitamin B5, Aloe vera, and Avocado oil to help soften and protect. This conditioner also reduces inflammation and calms the skin. Zeus Beard Conditioner is specifically formulated for your beard to provide optimal moisture and comfort. It's also great for sensitive skin. Comes in a godly refreshing Verbena Lime scent that contain hints of floral and citrus notes.

item.title: Beard Shampoo Wash 8 fl oz, Zeus Verbena Lime
item.description: Zeus Beard Shampoo in Verbena Lime can be used to clean your hair on a daily basis without stripping your beard of its natural oils. Zeus Beard Shampoo will leave your beard soft, unlike regular soaps and shampoos that can damage hair follicles and leave skin dry and irritated. Zeus Beard Shampoo is specifically formulated for your beard and is made with mild, natural ingredients to keep your beard clean, healthy, and shiny. Ingredients like dragon's blood has anti-inflammatory and antibiotic qualities to help fight acne by reducing inflammation, and discomfort while calming the skin. Chamomile cleans the beard while protecting the skin. Green tea suppresses inflammation and reduces irritation. The best beard shampoo that's perfect for sensitive skin and fit for a god.

item.title: Beard Balm Conditioner, Zeus Original Unscented 2 oz.
item.description: Zeus Beard Balm in Original Unscented is a fragrance-free way to simultaneously moisturize, tame, and add shine to your beard. Packed with natural extracts like Sunflower seed oil, Jojoba seed oil, Aloe vera, and Hemp Seed oil, Zeus Beard Balm softens your beard while keeping the skin underneath irritation free. There are non-clogging oils that protects the skin from free radicals. That means you can say goodbye to dreaded beard itch. Zeus Beard Balm provides light hold for a natural look and is easy to apply – simply apply the desired amount into beard, working it through with fingers. Since this beard balm is water-based, it washes out easily with water. This natural, fragrance-free balm is great for sensitive skin types. item.title: Zeus Beard Care Set, Verbena Lime
item.description:
Your beard introduces you before a single word is uttered. You’re bold. Rugged. A little defiant. The list goes on. Yet, as untamed as you may project yourself, you certainly don’t want to smell or feel like a wild animal, which is why we’ve created the Zeus Beard Care Set. This bundle includes what you need to keep your whiskers looking, feeling and smelling clean while keeping your inviting, masculine presence untouched:

  • Zeus Beard Shampoo: Put down your regular hair shampoo, and use this specially-formulated shampoo to cleanse your beard without irritating the sensitive areas on your face. Ingredients like Dragon’s Blood and green tea work to clean and calm your skin, and a verbena lime scent keeps you smelling fresh.

  • Zeus Beard Conditioner: Strengthen your hair and eliminate itchy skin with this moisturizing conditioner. Pro-Vitamin B5 and avocado oil keep your hair soft and healthy, while aloe vera and green tea calm and rehydrate the skin beneath your beard.

  • Zeus Pear Wood Palm Brush: The unassuming beard brush is the best kept secret in beard care. The Zeus Palm Brush is made with 100% boar bristles that are firm enough to penetrate even long and thick beards. The pear wood handle does not warp and is designed with finger grooves for more control when combing your beard. Use it to exfoliate your skin, to distribute natural oils throughout your beard and to tame scraggly, unkempt facial hair.

To your significant other, you may be a prickly talking cactus. Skip the irritation and save your loved ones from your scraggly beard with the help of the Zeus Deluxe Beard Care Kit. Inside is a full suite of beard care products that'll aid you in keeping your beard pleasing to the eye and even more pleasing to the touch:

item.title: Zeus Beard Oil Set
item.description:
Having a beard has its upsides and its downsides. Your beard gives you an outlet to express and complement your style, giving you an edge unmissed by both men and women alike. On the other end of the spectrum, beards can be a pain to maintain. They’re sometimes itchy, unpleasant to the touch and are prone to producing the dreaded beardruff. Luckily for you, we’ve got the remedy to this: the Zeus Beard Oil Set. This kit includes the fundamental beard care products to keep your beard hydrated, touchable and flake-free:

  • Zeus Beard Oil: Easily the best kept secret in beard care and grooming, beard oil is the cure-all for those singing the beard blues. Vitamin E hydrate your skin and lock in moisture to combat itchiness and beardruff. Argan oil and grape seed oil strengthen your beard hairs by moisturizing and conditioning each strand to prevent frizz, split ends and brittle hair. Your beard hair is softer, healthier and lustrous as a result. Available in your choice of Verbena Lime, Sandalwood, Vanilla Rum, Unscented, Tea Tree, or Natural Spiced Maple.

  • Zeus Pear Wood Boar Bristle Beard Brush: Made with 100% boar bristles, this beard brush is soft enough to use on your face, yet firm enough to exfoliate your skin and stimulate natural oil production for healthier hair follicles. This pear wood brush also increases the effectiveness of your beard oil by evenly distributing the beard oils throughout your untamed chin whiskers.

  • (1) Zeus Beard Oil - Verbena Lime, Sandalwood, Vanilla Rum, Unscented, Tea Tree, or Natural Spiced Maple

item.title: Beard Oil, Zeus Natural Unscented
item.description:
There are men that love to use beard oil for the floral and citrus scents. They like it, their ladies like it. It’s a no-brainer. But, there are also men that want to take advantage of the many benefits of beard oil but seek something unscented. Something minimal. Something pure. Here at Zeus, we’re birds of a similar feather and have bottled up our purest beard oil, the raw and Unscented Zeus Beard Oil. This concoction is comprised of the vital ingredients you need for a softer, smoother and healthier beard—nothing more, nothing less:
Safflower Seed Oil: Seals moisture in your skin to remedy beard itch and tightness. This scentless oil also adds an inviting and lustrous shine to your beard and won’t interfere with your own cologne or musk.
Argan Oil: Conditions beard hair for increased touchability and repairs damaged hair follicles. Sourced from Morocco, this lightweight oil also adds shine to your hair.
Vitamin E: Stimulates blood circulation for healthier, hydrated skin and less beardruff. Vitamin E can also repair split ends and adds shine to your beard.
Grape Seed Oil: Soothes the skin due to its anti-inflammatory properties and even acts as a mild astringent and anti-septic for acne-prone skin. Sourced from Chile, this oil also conditions brittle hair resulting in less breakage.

Paraben Free | Sulfate Free | Cruelty Free | US Made

item.title: Zeus Pear Wood Beard Brush Set
item.description:
At times, it may seem like your beard has a mind of its own. A straggler hair, here. A cowlick, there. Whether you’ve got a short, long, curly or straight beard, it’s not uncommon for your beard to reveal its wild side. A scraggly and rugged beard certainly can be appealing, but you want to avoid looking unkempt and ratty.

Enter the humble beard brush. This grooming tool evenly distributes oils through your beard hair and keeps your whiskers in line and at attention, resulting in a fuller and more lustrous beard. What’s more, the soft bristles exfoliate dead skin cells off of your skin to eliminate itchiness and beardruff. Grab the Zeus Pear Wood Beard Brush Set to equip yourself with all the tools necessary to tame your beastly facial hair:

  • Zeus Pear Wood Palm Beard Brush: This will be your go-to beard brush. Touch it. Smell it. Take it to dinner. Made with 100% boar bristles, this beard brush is firm enough to penetrate thickets of beard hair yet soft enough to massage—rather than irritate—your skin. Grooves on the sides of the pear wood handle make it comfortable to use during even the most lengthy grooming sessions.

  • Zeus Pear Wood Handled Beard Brush: The protruding handle makes this brush ideal for use on the moustache area. Unlike the conventional beard brush, this handled brush keeps your hand at a distance from what you are brushing, granting you greater vision for enhanced control and precision.

  • Zeus Pear Wood Pocket Beard Brush: At nearly an inch shorter than its bigger, rectangular brother, this travel-friendly beard brush has all the features of a full-size beard brush in a smaller, more compact body. Take this with you to tame your beard hairs on the fly.

item.title: Zeus Ultimate Beard Care & Styling Kit, Verbena Lime
item.description:
Discerning the difference between the intermediate and the master requires close inspection. As breathtaking and momentous as virtuosity is to behold, the genius of the master is in the details. It’s subtle, nuanced and usually undetectable by the less competent. This is a universal principle and applies to even the most routine parts of your day like keeping that scruff under your chin looking good. To help you achieve mastery of your beard, we’ve assembled the finest beard products and made the perfect beard grooming kit.

Zeus Beard Shampoo: Gently cleanse excess oils, dirt and other contaminants out of your beard without irritating your skin. Ingredients like Green Tea and Chamomile soothe the skin for a refreshing finish.

Zeus Beard Conditioner: Ailments like beard itch and beard dandruff are the result of poorly hydrated skin and damaged hair follicles. Nurse your beard to health with this conditioner’s restorative blend of Pro-Vitamin B5 and Avocado Oil.

Zeus Beard Oil: Using beard oil separates the amateur beardsman from the masterful one. Not only does it soften your manly mane, but it also keeps your beard and skin hydrated to prevent discomfort resulting from dry skin and coarse hairs.

Zeus Beard Balm: Similar to beard oil, beard balm conditions your facial hair for a softer, more lustrous mug rug. The difference lies in the balm’s beeswax component, which results in a fuller, shapeable beard.

Zeus Stainless Steel Scissors: We’ve paired up with Dovo—the bastion of quality and precision—to create a barber shop-quality beard grooming tool. These stainless steel scissors are lightweight yet feel solid in your hand.

Zeus Natural Horn Mustache Comb: Genuine horn material saw-cut comb is composed of keratin for shinier and stronger hair. This grooming implement isn't your average 'stache comb. This pocket-friendly, fine tooth comb glides through even dense facial hair without scratching the skin thanks to its rounded tips.

Zeus Natural Horn Wide Tooth Beard Comb in Leather Sheath: This wide-tooth genuine horn comb is for men with dense beard growth. This comb comes with a handy genuine leather sheath for on-the-fly grooming.

Zeus Palm Beard Brush: If we’re going to build the ultimate beard care kit, we have to include our favorite beard brush. This 100% boar bristle brush fits comfortably in the palm of your hand and will easily be your go to grooming tool to keep your bristles soft, shiny and healthy.

Zeus Pear Wood Pocket Beard Brush: The runt of the litter, this 100% boar bristle brush is sized to conveniently accompany you out there on the road. Keep this travel-friendly brush in your glove compartment, your bag or even your pocket for on-the-go styling.

item.title: Zeus Original Pomade
item.description: Pompadours, side parts, quiffs—the modern man owes much to the dapper gents that first donned the hair styles so prevalent today, but he doesn’t owe them everything. With styles like undercuts and low mid fades, the looks you see today are a violent clash of past and present, resulting in fresh and new styles. Modern classics. Inspired by the spirit of marrying past and present, we’re proud to bring you the Zeus Original Pomade. This styling product boasts a classic medium hold and a natural shine with all-day pliability for low profile styles like side parts and elevated ‘dos like pomps and quiffs. With a greater awareness of the benefits of today’s most popular natural ingredients, we’ve included Jojoba Wax, Castor Oil and Keratin Protein into the Zeus Original Pomade formula to also strengthen your hair throughout the day. As both a styling product and a fortifying conditioner, Zeus Original Pomade truly shapes up to be a modern classic. Contents: 4 oz | 113.4 g <hr> Paraben Free | Sulfate Free | Cruelty Free | Made in the USA

item.title: Firm Hold Pomade, Zeus Natural Verbena Lime
item.description: Oil-based hair products were once the go-to styling agent of individuals rocking dramatic hair styles like slick backs, side parts and pompadours. Today, with increased awareness of the damaging effects of components like petrolatum, oil-based products’ time in the limelight has gone. Here at Zeus, we believe that the end of oil-based products shouldn’t also mean the end of dramatic hair styles, which is why we’ve created our Zeus Firm Hold Pomade. With its heavy hold and long-lasting pliability, the Zeus Firm Hold Pomade retains the finest qualities of oil-based pomades while replacing harmful petrolatum with conditioning ingredients like Jojoba Wax, Aloe Vera Juice and Keratin Protein. And, unlike its gunky predecessor, this nourishing pomade is a cinch to rinse out when your day is through, thanks to its water-based formula. Make Zeus Firm Hold Pomade your new go-to for those hair styles we all admire. <hr> Paraben Free | Sulfate Free | Cruelty Free | Made in the USA

item.title: Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Mustache Comb
item.description: Facial hair needs care and attention especially those hairs upstairs, formally known as your mustache. Unlike the whiskers on your chin and cheeks, your ‘stache is prone to whisking up a dollop of ketchup or some foam off your stout. Fortunately, the solution is simple, and you can obtain it in the form of our Zeus Handmade Mustache Comb (3”L x 0.75”W). With its fine teeth and static-free cellulose acetate construction, this grooming implement effectively tames wily whiskers while also evenly distributing your favorite oil or wax through your hairs. This pocket-friendly mustache comb features 3/8-inch long teeth to penetrate even the thickest mustaches. Each of these handmade combs are saw cut, polished and buffed to produce rounded tips that glide comfortably across your skin. Tame your ‘stache with the essential Zeus Handmade Mustache Comb.

item.title: Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Pocket Beard Comb with Leather Sheath
item.description: Following your daily morning ritual, you are at the peak of your groomed self. Breath is minty. Beard is smooth. You’re fresh, clean and seemingly invincible. Fast forward to 2 pm. There’s a lingering hint of mustard in your breath, and there are scraggly hairs pointing every which way from your beard. That’s when the Zeus Handmade Pocket Beard Comb (5.25”L x 1”W) comes in handy. While it won’t freshen your breath, this nifty tool is effective at bringing your beard back to its best form. This premium beard comb is made out of pure cellulose acetate to minimize static for smooth passes through your facial hair. Each comb is saw-cut, hand-polished and finally buffed to produce flat, snag-free teeth with rounded tips that massage—rather than scratch—the skin. Zeus Handmade Pocket Beard Comb comes with a genuine leather sheath (5.25” x 1-5/8”) to protect your comb until 2 pm hits again.

item.title: Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Beard Comb
item.description: Distinguishing the amateur beardsman from the seasoned one is an easy task; just see how they get it ready for the world. The novice will use his hand to smooth most scraggly hairs down. There’s the intermediate beardsman who grooms with a cheap polystyrene plastic comb he found in his miscellaneous drawer. Finally there’s the experienced beardsman who uses a premium grooming tool like the Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Beard Comb (6”L x 1”W). Made with durable cellulose acetate, this grooming implement minimizes static buildup while combing. Unlike mass-produced molded combs, this beard comb is saw-cut and hand-polished to create rounded teeth that won’t damage your hair or skin. This handmade comb features medium- and fine-toothed sides for untangling and refining unkempt facial hair. Throw out your old plastic comb and step up your beard game with the Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Beard Comb.

This brush in particular is equipped with firm boar bristles—the most sought cut of boar bristles. In contrast to other cuts, firm bristles are firmer to penetrate thicker beards with ease.

Each bundle of firm boar bristles are inset in a warp-resistant pear wood handle, complete with finger grooves for grip. The Zeus Military-Style 100% Firm Boar Bristle Oval Brush comes in reusable black tin, making it a great gift idea for the refined beardsman. item.title: Zeus Natural Horn Mustache Comb in Leather Sheath
item.description: The Zeus Natural Horn Mustache Comb is a fine way to keep your 'stache in shape. While it may be easy to get distracted by this comb's exquisite grain pattern, you should do your best to keep in mind the inimitable benefits of saw-cut horn combs. Horn is composed of a protein called keratin—a natural protein that also composes our own skin, hair and nails. The identical molecular structure of horn glides through hair—unlike plastic—while also closing hair cuticles for a shinier and stronger result. Each comb is saw-cut with rounded tips that massage rather than scratch the skin. The Zeus Natural Horn Mustache Comb includes a protective leather sheath, making for a perfect pocket companion for grooming on the fly.

item.title: Zeus Natural Horn Medium Tooth Beard Comb in Leather Sheath
item.description: Zeus Natural Horn Medium Tooth Beard Comb is more than just aesthetically exquisite. Its genuine horn construction boasts anti-static properties and doesn't tug at hairs like its plastic counterpart. The keratin in horn closes hair cuticles to enhance shine and to protect your beard against the elements. Each comb is handmade and saw-cut with rounded teeth that massage the skin and hair follicles. Included is a genuine leather sheath to protect the Zeus Natural Horn Medium Tooth Beard Comb when you're out and about.

item.title: Zeus Natural Horn Wide Tooth Beard Comb in Leather Sheath
item.description: Zeus Natural Horn Wide Tooth Beard Comb is the choice grooming tool for men with thick or curly beard hair or dense beard growth. The wide gaps between teeth in combination with the comb's smooth-gliding horn material construction allow for effortless passes through even the wildest beards. Each comb is saw-cut and polished to further diminish any friction that would damage your skin or facial hair. The patterns differ from comb to comb due to it being made of genuine horn. The Zeus Natural Horn Wide Tooth Beard Comb comes with a protective leather sheath to keep it in fine condition until your next brushing.

item.title: Beard Shampoo Wash 8 fl oz, Zeus Sandalwood
item.description:
Zeus Beard Shampoo in Sandalwood can be used to cleanse your hair daily without stripping your beard of natural oils. Zeus Beard Shampoo will leave your beard soft and manageable unlike regular soaps and shampoos that can damage hair follicles and leave skin dry and irritated.


Zeus Beard Shampoo is specifically formulated for your beard and is made with mild, natural ingredients to keep your beard clean, healthy, and shiny. Great for sensitive skin!

Featured Ingredients:
Dragon's Blood: Dragon's Blood has anti-inflammatory and antibiotic qualities. It helps fight acne by reducing inflammation and discomfort while calming the skin.
Chamomile: Cleans the beard while protecting the skin.
Green Tea: Suppresses inflammation and reduces irritation.

Directions: Push the top open and squeeze a small amount of beard wash onto your fingertips. Massage into your face and beard (try not get it in your eyes). Rinse and repeat as necessary.

PARABEN FREE | SULFATE FREE | CRUELTY FREE

item.title: Zeus Ultimate Beard Care & Styling Kit, Sandalwood
item.description:
Discerning the difference between the intermediate and the master requires close inspection. As breathtaking and momentous as virtuosity is to behold, the genius of the master is in the details. It’s subtle, nuanced and usually undetectable by the less competent. This is a universal principle and applies to even the most routine parts of your day like keeping that scruff under your chin looking good. To help you achieve mastery of your beard, we’ve assembled the finest beard products and grooming tools in a comprehensive beard grooming kit, the Zeus Ultimate Beard Care and Styling Kit:

Zeus Beard Shampoo: Gently cleanse excess oils, dirt and other contaminants out of your beard without irritating your skin. Ingredients like Green Tea and Chamomile soothe the skin for a refreshing finish.

Zeus Beard Conditioner: Ailments like beard itch and beard dandruff are the result of poorly hydrated skin and damaged hair follicles. Nurse your beard to health with this conditioner’s restorative blend of Pro-Vitamin B5 and Avocado Oil.

Zeus Beard Oil: Using beard oil separates the amateur beardsman from the masterful one. Not only does it soften your manly mane, but it also keeps your beard and skin hydrated to prevent discomfort resulting from dry skin and coarse hairs.

Zeus Beard Balm: Similar to beard oil, beard balm conditions your facial hair for a softer, more lustrous mug rug. The difference lies in the balm’s beeswax component, which results in a fuller, shapeable beard.

Zeus Stainless Steel Scissors: We’ve paired up with Dovo—the bastion of quality and precision—to create a barber shop-quality beard grooming tool. These stainless steel scissors are lightweight yet feel solid in your hand.

Zeus Natural Horn Mustache Comb in Leather Sheath: Genuine horn material saw-cut comb is composed of keratin for shinier and stronger hair. This grooming implement isn't your average 'stache comb. This pocket-friendly, fine tooth comb glides through even dense facial hair without scratching the skin thanks to its rounded tips.

Zeus Natural Horn Wide Tooth Beard Comb in Leather Sheath: This wide-tooth genuine horn comb is for men with dense beard growth. This comb comes with a handy genuine leather sheath for on-the-fly grooming.

Zeus Pear Wood Palm Beard Brush: If we’re going to build the ultimate beard care kit, we have to include our favorite beard brush. This 100% boar bristle brush fits comfortably in the palm of your hand and will easily be your go to grooming tool to keep your bristles soft, shiny and healthy.

Zeus Pear Wood Pocket Beard Brush: The runt of the litter, this 100% boar bristle brush is sized to conveniently accompany you out there on the road. Keep this travel-friendly brush in your glove compartment, your bag or even your pocket for on-the-go styling.

item.title: Firm Hold Pomade 3-Pack, Zeus Natural Verbena Lime
item.description: Oil-based hair products were once the go-to styling agent of individuals rocking dramatic hair styles like slick backs, side parts and pompadours. Today, with increased awareness of the damaging effects of components like petrolatum, oil-based products’ time in the limelight has gone. Here at Zeus, we believe that the end of oil-based products shouldn’t also mean the end of dramatic hair styles, which is why we’ve created our Zeus Firm Hold Pomade. With its heavy hold and long-lasting pliability, the Zeus Firm Hold Pomade retains the finest qualities of oil-based pomades while replacing harmful petrolatum with conditioning ingredients like Jojoba Wax, Aloe Vera Juice and Keratin Protein. And, unlike its gunky predecessor, this nourishing pomade is a cinch to rinse out when your day is through, thanks to its water-based formula. Make Zeus Firm Hold Pomade your new go-to for those hair styles we all admire. <hr> Paraben Free | Sulfate Free | Cruelty Free | Made in the USA

2) Stick the suction cups to the mirror

The keratin in horn closes hair cuticles to enhance shine and to protect your beard against the elements. This makes it an excellent tool to use to come the hair on both the bottom and top of your head. Each comb is handmade and saw-cut with rounded teeth that massage the skin and hair follicles.

Preservation Of Horn Combs and Care Tips
  • Do not expose horn combs to moisture or water.
  • Keep horn combs away from direct sunlight
  • Horn combs can become deformed by high temperatures and corroded by detergents
  • In extreme circumstances (exposure to excessive heat, soaked in water), natural horn combs may give off an unpleasant odor. Keep the combs cool and dry, and the odor will disappear soon.

Zeus Hair Conditioner with Argan Oil - Replenishes hair to provide superior strength and manageability. Made of all-natural ingredients, it drastically improves the texture of dry and brittle hair and restores moisture.
What's Inside:
(1) Zeus Hair Shampoo with Argan Oil, 8 fl oz - Verbena Lime
(1) Zeus Hair Conditioner with Argan Oil, 8 fl oz - Verbena Lime

item.title: Zeus Mustache Styling Wax, Mega Hold - 3 Pack
item.description: Tired of reapplying your droopy mustache throughout the day? Zeus Mustache Styling Wax features a superior formula that maintains the shape of your 'stache all day. It sculpts tough, unruly hairs into a godly 'stache. Formulated to transform facial hair with a mega strong hold, it offers the flexibility to create perfect twists and handle bars. The consistency is best described as a cross between a paste and a gel. Goes on clear and holds all day. Its water-based formula allows for easy rinse-outs. Made in Germany.

item.title: Clay Pomade, Extra Firm, Zeus Natural Verbena Lime
item.description: Zeus Clay Pomade is a holy grail hair product, it can achieve a wide range of hair styles- from an effortless, messy look to a defined, structured look. Features an extra firm hold, water-soluble formula for easy rinse outs and a refreshing citrus floral scent. Rub a small amount in between fingers and apply to dry hair for a natural look or apply more product onto damp hair to increase holds for a structured style. Use a comb to evenly distribute the product to create a clean, finished look. Zeus Clay Pomade keeps your hair in place to deliver a strong and pliable hold all day long.

item.title: Cream Pomade, Zeus Natural Verbena Lime
item.description:
Zeus Cream Pomade is a moisture-rich cream that provides textured definition, all-day pliability, and a matte finish. Create a whole range of styles from laid back to more defined styles with its medium hold. Its water-soluble formula makes it easy to rinse out when your day is done. Ideal for short to medium hairstyles, perfect for creating messy bed head looks.

How to Use: Scoop a small amount of pomade onto palm and rub palms together. Distribute pomade evenly through damp or dry hair. Style as desired. To restyle, lightly dampen your hair with a wet comb or fingers.

item.title: Beard Balm Conditioner, Zeus Vanilla Rum 2 oz.
item.description: Harsh elements don't stand a chance when you apply this godly Beard Balm Conditioner to your beard. Natural ingredients like Sunflower and Jojoba Oils moisturize and protect your beard hairs and the skin beneath. Made with a base of Beeswax and Candelila Wax, it provides the strength you need to get stubborn straggler hairs in line. Zeus Beard Balm softens your beard while keeping the skin underneath irritation free. There are non-clogging oils that protects the skin from free radicals. That means you can say goodbye to dreaded beard itch. Zeus Beard Balm provides light hold for a natural look and is easy to apply – simply apply the desired amount into beard, working it through with fingers. Since this beard balm is water-based, it washes out easily with water. It also makes for an easy, touch-up throughout the day. Great for sensitive skin types. Take control of your beard with this godly Zeus Beard Balm Conditioner.

item.title: Zeus Stainless Steel Comb Thunderbolt - Powder Coated Black
item.description: This popular grooming tool has a striking new look in an edgy powder coated black finish! The Zeus Stainless Steel Comb Thunderbolt features smooth rounded teeth that won't tug at hairs, beautifully laser-cut from stainless steel, and is hand-finished. It is small enough to fit into your pocket but long enough for both fine and wide tooth combing. It's ultra- durable so you don't have to worry about breaking another comb in your pocket ever again. This solid comb features an edgy thunderbolt cut out design. Maintain a godly beard with a sturdy, long lasting steel comb.

item.title: Zeus Stainless Steel Comb Pocket Size
item.description: Keep your mane on point at all times with the Zeus Stainless Steel Comb Pocket Size. It comfortably fits into your back pocket and it's ultra-durable so you don't have to worry about breaking another comb again. This solid comb features smooth rounded teeth that won't tug at hairs, hand-finished, beautifully laser-cut from stainless steel with edgy thunderbolts. Maintain a fierce beard wherever, whenever.

item.title: Zeus Handled Mustache & Beard Brush with Bag - 100% Boar Bristle - Soft
item.description: The Zeus Pear Wood 100% Soft Boar Small Bristle Mustache and Beard Brush with Handle is a fine grooming tool made specially for those who prefer a firm yet softer bristles. The ergonomic handle allows you to groom and style with ease, while the boar bristles remove dirt for a nice and tidy beard. These bristles feature rounded tips which are gentle on your skin. The boar bristles on this brush evenly distribute the natural oils from your beard to repair dry hair and to enhance shine. With regular use, you'll also see far more volume and far less frizz.

item.title: Zeus Hand Drawn Ebony Wood Handle Hair Brush with 100% Boar Bristles, Limited Edition
item.description: The Zeus Hair Brush is crafted with traditional techniques to provide a unique tool to care for your godly mane. The brush boasts a dark Ebony wood handle and body that has been finely polished. First cut, 100% Boar Bristles make for a stiff, yet gentle brush. Each bristle knot was crafted using a traditional hand drawn technique. This means that a wire was first fed through the back of the brush, then small bundles of the boar bristles were pushed and pulled to be placed in the holes. The wires holding the bristles were then pulled to tighten the rows and secured to the back inside of the brush. The bristles are left uneven to penetrate deeper into your hair while smoothing the outside layer. The brush includes a smaller Ebony handle cleaning brush to help remove hair, lint, and dirt from the hair brush. Also included is a white polishing cloth for caring or storage.

item.title: Zeus Ribbed Knit Beanie, Black
item.description: Add instant warmth and style to your winter attire with a Zeus Ribbed Knit Beanie. Made from 100% Acrylic material, a great option for those with allergies or sensitive skin. It's soft and stretchy, fits comfortably on your head. This essential winter staple features a solid color wash, ribbed knitting, fold-over cuff and Zeus logo tag.

item.title: Zeus Large Curved Sandalwood Beard Comb with Sheath
item.description: Zeus Large Curved Sandalwood Comb fits comfortably in bigger hands for greater control. Its natural sandalwood construction emits a calming, woodsy scent while fighting static. It features medium teeth that glide through hair smoothly unlike rough plastic combs that tend to break hair. Includes a faux leather sheath to protect your comb during your travels and a gift box. This godly grooming tool was created for the mighty man with the mighty beard.

item.title: Zeus 7.5" Handmade Saw-Cut 2-in-1 Beard & Mustache Comb
item.description:
Staying well-groomed isn't an easy task, but the Zeus 7.5" Handmade Saw-Cut 2-in-1 Beard & Mustache Comb can certainly make it easier. This combination beard and mustache comb allows you to keep every inch of your facial hair in good shape. Just flip the comb, and you've got yourself a new grooming tool.

The Zeus 7.5" Handmade Saw-Cut 2-in-1 Beard & Mustache Comb is made of plant-based cellulose acetate, which is a resilient and static-free material that you want your comb made of. Each comb is saw-cut and hand-polished for smooth teeth that won't tug. Carefully rounded teeth ensure that every pass leaves your skin looking and feeling its best.

item.title: Zeus 7.5" Handmade Saw-Cut 2-in-1 Beard & Mustache Comb, Tortoiseshell
item.description:
The most wayward whiskers can oftentimes be beyond manageable by hands alone. In such cases, you'll want to reach for the Zeus 7.5" Handmade Saw-Cut 2-in-1 Beard & Mustache Comb, Tortoiseshell. This versatile combination beard and mustache grooming implement is equipped with two sides: one side to tame the longer and thicker beard on your chin and another side to whip the whiskers of your mustache into shape.

This 2-in-1 comb is constructed using the resilient, plant-based cellulose acetate. This material is static-free and can weather the most eventful movement in your pocket. Each comb is hand-polished and saw-cut for smooth passes through that mane of yours. Whip those wayward whiskers into shape with the Zeus 7.5" Handmade Saw-Cut 2-in-1 Beard & Mustache Comb, Tortoiseshell.

item.title: Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Mustache Comb, Tortoiseshell
item.description:
Small but mighty, the Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Mustache Comb, Tortoiseshell is the best way to keep your nose neighbor nice and orderly. Made specifically for mustaches, this comb keeps your mustache groomed on the go and is small enough to stash in the coin pocket of your jeans.

Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Mustache Comb, Tortoiseshell is made of resilient, static-free pure plant cellulose acetate for the utmost durability in your pocket. Each comb is saw-cut and hand-polished, resulting in edges as smooth as butter. The rounded edges massage the skin beneath your stash, and a classic tortoiseshell pattern makes this a tough tool to put down.

item.title: Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Beard Comb, Tortoiseshell
item.description:
Cleanliness is next to godliness. And like a true god, you'll want to clean up your act with an indispensable tool like the Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Beard Comb, Tortoiseshell. This combination beard comb takes your beard to a level unknown to mere mortals and allows you to get your beard and mustache looking as they should.

The Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Beard Comb, Tortoiseshell is made of static-free cellulose acetate for resilience and its static-free properties. Each comb is saw-cut and hand-polished with rounded tips for smooth, scratch-free passes through your beard and mustache. Get godly with the Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Beard Comb, Tortoiseshell.

item.title: Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Mustache Comb, Tortoiseshell, 3 Pack
item.description:
Keeping your mustache looking great all day demands persistence especially after eating or even a boisterous laugh. As a a mustachioed man, you have to be properly equipped all times, which is why we've created the Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Mustache Comb, Tortoiseshell, 3 Pack. You get three of our popular Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Mustache Comb in Tortoiseshell to keep at your most frequented areas. Stash one at home, work, and in your gym bag.

The Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Mustache Comb is constructed using cellulose acetate, a plant-derived material that is resilient enough to endure the toss and tumble of a busy day. Each comb is saw-cut and hand-polished to product the smoothest edges that glide rather than snag your mustache hairs. Each tip is rounded for further comfort. Grab the Zeus Handmade Saw-Cut Mustache Comb, Tortoiseshell, 3 Pack to elevate your mustache game.

item.title: Zeus Hair Comb, 5"
item.description: The Zeus Hair comb is the perfect tool for getting your day started. Made with a heavy duty plastic, this comb is extremely strong, virtually unbreakable and long lasting. The tapered teeth - from wide to fine - will detangle or style all hair types.

item.title: Zeus Oval Military Beard Brush with Bag - 100% Boar Bristle - Firm
item.description: The Zeus Oval Military Beard Brush is instrumental in the creation of godly beard. This exquisite brush is made with 100% firm bristles - the highest grade boar bristle - to penetrate thick beard growth. Firm bristles are the stiffest and most desirable cuts of a boar's bristles. The bulbous tips of these firm bristles massage the skin to exfoliate dead skin cells while distributing natural oils throughout your beard. Each bristle is inset in the warp-resistant pear wood handle, which features and ergonomic body with finger grooves for optimal grip during vigorous brushings.

item.title: Zeus Oval Military Beard Brush with Bag - 100% Boar Bristle - Soft
item.description:
Those of you with bigger hands and bigger beards will want to get your meathooks on the Zeus Military-Style 100% Soft Boar Bristle Beard Brush. This beard brush features a large, oval handle that sits perfectly in your palm for grip during even the most vigorous brushings. Grooves on the side of the handle further promote grip and a warp-resistant pear wood construction ensures you’ll have this grooming implement for a while.

Zeus Military-Style 100% Soft Boar Bristle Oval Brush is equipped with softer boar bristles, which is ideal for those with sensitive skin or sparser beard growth. The natural bristles are made of the same material as the hairs on your face and will not damage the cuticles of your facial hairs like synthetic materials do. This essential brush is a fantastic gift idea as it comes in a collectible black tin and even includes a handy metal brush cleaner. Keep your beard game strong with the Zeus Oval Military-Style Brush.

item.title: Zeus Eucalyptus Lemongrass Steam Mist, 4 fl oz
item.description:
The Zeus Eucalyptus Lemongrass Steam Mist is made of pure eucalyptus and lemongrass oil. Throughout the years, lemongrass oil has become popular for its aromatic properties. It has the ability to relieve stress and relax the body. By infusing the lemongrass with the eucalyptus oil, this combination will not only rejuvenate your spirits but keep your body relaxed throughout the day.


Preshave Use: Spray once on a hot towel and put on your face to achieve a closer shave. Remove the towel after it cools down then begin your shave routine.

Shower Use: Spray once into a warm shower prior to entering. The steam enhances the mist to clear your sinuses and help you breathe deeper.

item.title: Zeus Brush Cleaning Rake
item.description: A nifty brush cleaner to keep your brush in tip-top shape. Glide it across your brush a couple times to remove any excess debris and particles.

item.title: Zeus Pocket Beard Brush with Bag -100% Boar Bristle - Medium Firm
item.description:
Ideal for medium to long beard lengths, the compact Zeus Pocket Beard Brush with Bag is outfitted with softer, medium firm 100% boar hair bristles. Each bristle plug is filled with different, individual length boar hair bristles to tame inner hairs while leaving outer hairs looking smooth.

Boar hair bristles also go the extra mile, keeping your beard voluminous and dirt-free. To compliment, this compact brush features a contoured, warp resistant pear wood handle for better grip. Use in combination with Zeus beard oil for even distribution for an even more godly beard.

Includes protective cloth bag.

Made in Germany.

item.title: Zeus Acetate Hair Comb, 7.5" Traditional
item.description:
Sure, you’ve got that beard under control. But what’s that mop on your head? Tame that wild mane with the Zeus 7.5” Handmade Large Hair Comb! Made from sheets of plant based cellulose acetate, this comb is naturally static free to stop frizz and breakage. It also features two types of teeth: Medium to smooth and shape, fine to detail and finish off your style.



While each comb is unique in its appearance, every comb is hand polished and saw-cut for smooth passes. Rounded tip teeth provide a comfortable, scratch free grooming experience. Oh, and did we mention size? This bad boy measures in at 7.5” long, making it ideal for those with larger, godly hands.

item.description:
